title: Impact of the Voting Rights Act

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the Voting Rights Act of 1965 ?

choices.label: It was unnecessary because the Fifteenth Amendment effectively guaranteed African Americans the right to vote.
It has never been applied to any group except southern African Americans.
It has been a major instrument for increasing the number of African American and other minority voters.
It was declared unconstitutional by the United States Supreme Court in Shaw v. Reno.
It requires that minority officeholders be elected.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
